item.title: Circuit Breakers in Python
item.description: The Circuit Breaker pattern is commonly used in microservice architectures to fail quickly when an external service is down. This prevents a single service from bringing down the entire system and allows functionality to gracefully degrade. I spent part of the last weekend building my own version of a circuit breaker. There are already many existing implementations in Python, however there were a few things I wanted in a circuit breaker implementation that I couldn’t seem to find.
